data.title: Add Search to a Confluence Space
data.meta_description: To add a search box to your space, there are two macros that you can choose from. Additional information for each macro is below each description. Livesearch Macro Livesearch: shows search result keystroke by keystroke, as the user is entering the search term. Example: {livesearch:spaceKey=xxxxxx}, where xxxxxx=the key for your space.
data.text:
To add a search box to your space, there are two macros that you can choose from. Additional information for each macro is below each description.

Livesearch Macro

Livesearch: shows search result keystroke by keystroke, as the user is entering the search term. Example: {livesearch:spaceKey=xxxxxx}, where xxxxxx=the key for your space.
